meanings.sent1: The fox was wilier than the rabbit, outsmarting it at every turn.
meanings.sent2: She had a wilier plan to catch the thief red-handed.
meanings.sent3: The wilier raccoon managed to steal the picnic basket without anyone noticing.
meanings.sent4: His wilier tactics in the negotiation left his opponents speechless.
meanings.sent5: The wilier detective always solved the case before anyone else.

meanings.definition: More crafty or cunning than someone or something else
meanings.sent1: The wilier cat always managed to catch more mice than the other cats in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent2: She became wilier with each chess game she played, always staying one step ahead of her opponents.
meanings.sent3: The wilier student found a way to get extra credit without the teacher noticing.
meanings.sent4: His wilier strategy in the game made him the champion among his friends.
meanings.sent5: The wilier spy always gathered more information than anyone else on the team.
